meaningMnemonic: If you scrape a sharp <radical>stone</radical> against your <radical>skin</radical>, it will <kanji>tear</kanji>. The sharp stone tears your skin. It hurts!
readingMnemonic: The moment your skin <kanji>tear</kanji>s you can't help but yelp "<reading>Ha</reading> (は)!" It sounds like a laugh, but it's more like a pained bark.
